availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Braswell (Lyon County, Kentucky, resident and soldier)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Nicholas T. and Mary J. Braswell. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in 1850. Lyon County resident in 1860. Officer in the United States Navy.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-0358.
KYR-0001-029-0393.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 327B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 835.
Find A Grave, "Charles N Braswell (1840-1871)," Memorial #6656697, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6656697 (accessed May 18, 2020).
